titleStmt.title: Toleration discuss'd, in two dialogues I. betwixt a conformist, and a non-conformist ... II. betwixt a Presbyterian, and an Independent ...
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.C. and A.C. for Henry Brome ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, NewYork.
Attributed to Roger L'Estrange. cf. NUC pre-1956.
